item.description:
Rainaissance 1.1.5 Release Notes

Rain Behind Windows!

New feature! You can now choose rain behind all windows, over all windows (but not in fullscreen), or over all windows including fullscreen. This was a much requested feature, and I hope you enjoy rain on your wallpaper as much as I do. It's great for when you don't want rain interfering with your work but you still like the moody feel on your wallpaper.
